item.title: Activities
item.description: Activities Regular Meeting The meeting is held every Friday at 18:10 in the lounge on the 2nd floor in front of the research building/room S8. The location will be announced on the LINE group. All activities will be decided at this meeting, so all club members are required to attend. Distribution We mainly distribute our journal “NOW” free of charge on campus, and some volunteers publish additional issues. We also distribute a coterie magazine by freshmans at Summer Comic Market.

item.title: Introduction
item.description: For Applicant C-cube welcomes people who want to create something regardless of their field and who want to talk passionately about media. If you are interested in observing our activities, please check our official Twitter and feel free to visit us at our activity place. No appointment is necessary. If you want to join our club, please contact us by DM or Mail. Please make the subject “[ccc] I want to join the club” and include your name and student ID.
